name: CNN
text: President Trump heads into the first presidential debate trailing former VP Joe Biden in the polls and on defense about his handling of the pandemic, which has killed more than 200,000 Americans and led some 30 million people to file unemployment claims https://t.co/LsTQem9Oe5

name: CNN
text: More than 1.2 million Americans have already cast their presidential ballots without waiting for the first scheduled debate between President Trump and former Vice President Joe Biden, according to a CNN survey of election officials in 20 states https://t.co/A2b8Ehw7gK

name: CNN
text: In North Carolina and Wisconsin alone, more than 500,000 ballots have already been cast. https://t.co/n2POQtjIDP https://t.co/l1xdRISjds

name: CNN
text:
Donald Trump could face the most direct challenge of his presidency to his handling of the pandemic, the economy and his personal conduct in his first debate against Democratic nominee Joe Biden on Tuesday.

Here are six things to watch in the debate. https://t.co/16NQtkTZQP

name: CNN
text:
Globally, the hunger crisis has already been exacerbated by climate change, existing conflicts, and inequalities.

But now, coupled with Covid-19, people worldwide have hunger and malnutrition to worry about even more. Here is how you can help. https://t.co/baGGU9uBxt
